description:
Come one! Come all! Pay sixpence to see the freaks! Real Live Core
Developers, answering questions for your edification!

Abstract

This is a repeat of the ever-popular "hit the core developers with hard
questions" panel.

Covers issues brought up by Eric's talk, checkin rights, portable apps,
the global settings file, backwards incompatible changes, contrib,
educating users on finding tools and libraries, what's coming in django
1.3, memory usage in django, required resources for django core
development, best part of django today, and problems with external
dependencies not shipped with django.
title: Technical Design Panel
